content: **size** 1 2 **measurements** width 17 23 cm / 6 75 9 inches length approx 190 200 cm / 74 75 78 75 inches **materials** version 1 merino copenhagen fibers color a 2 3 skeins color 2 color b 2 3 skeins color 24 version 2 merino copenhagen fibers color a 2 3 skeins color 2 color b 2 3 skeins color 6 circular needles 4 5 mm 60 cm **yarn quality** merino copenhagen fibers 100% wool 50 g = 108 m **gauge** 20 sts x 30 r = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 inches in 6x6 rib stitch k6 p6 using needles 4 5 mm always use the needle size that gives you the correct gauge in both height and width measured after washing and blocking **pattern information** the thekla scarf is worked back and forth in 6x6 rib with narrow stripes using two colors in each end you will work 2x2 rib you will increase after the 2x2 rib edge at the beginning and decrease again just before the 2x2 rib edge at the end of the piece be careful not to pull the yarn too tight at the color changes along the edge finally block the piece to the given measurements to smooth out the edges and rib pattern **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8
